amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to defund the implementation of COVID-19 era guidance reducing the hours of operation for CBP at certain Northern Border Ports of Entry to respond to a massive increase in border encounters and non-marijuana drug seizures in North Dakota, Idaho, Minnesota, and Western New York between FY21 and FY23, with adequate staffing and hours of operation to support interdiction and enforcement efforts at Northern Ports of Entry.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Armstrong amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Armstrong amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
